meaningMnemonic: On its <radical>scooter</radical>, a <radical>horn</radical>ed creature from <radical>heaven</radical> will take things you want to <kanji>send</kanji> there.
readingMnemonic: You want to <kanji>send</kanji> your <reading>sou</reading>l (そう) to heaven. I mean, you don't want it to go to some of those other places you've heard of, so why not send your soul?
